uvi.description:
xen/balloon: use a kernel thread instead a workqueue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.70 by commit 372d3e6ea1e115942fdfb4b25f7003d822d071be. For more details please see the references link.
